citations.narrative:
Housekeeping. The floor contains accumulations of hay, peanut shells, dirt, and debris. Cobwebs are present on walls
and ceiling of the animal room. Animal facilities must be kept clean to prevent pest problems and unnecessary disease
risks. Correct by ensuring the premises are kept clean, including: removing accumulations of hay, peanut shells, dirt,
debris, and cobwebs from floor, ceiling and walls; and routinely dusting off and sanitizing surfaces. Correct by May 9,
2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
3.31(b) 
   
Sanitation. 
Housekeeping. The floor contains accumulations of hay, peanut shells, dirt, and debris. Cobwebs are present on walls 
and ceiling of the animal room. Animal facilities must be kept clean to prevent pest problems and unnecessary disease 
risks. Correct by ensuring the premises are kept clean, including: removing accumulations of hay, peanut shells, dirt, 
debris, and cobwebs from floor, ceiling and walls; and routinely dusting off and sanitizing surfaces. Correct by May 9, 
2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
